import React, { Component } from 'react' import GoogleLogin from 'react-google-login' const style1 = { width: '3rem', fill: '#0160A2' } const style2 = { width: '23rem' } export default class App extends Component { state = { email: 'none', name: 'none', surname: 'none', profilePic: '' } responseGoogle = (resp) => { console.log(resp); console.log(resp.profileObj); // if (resp.profileObj.email) this.setState({ email: resp.profileObj.email, name: resp.profileObj.givenName, surname: resp.profileObj.familyName, profilePic: resp.profileObj.imageUrl }); alert(`email: ${this.state.email}\nname: ${this.state.name} ${this.state.surname}`) } render() { return (
